name: Nate Weidner
about: Business student at Cedarville University with expertise in event direction, community building, and visual content creation. Founder of a graphic design community with over 10,000 members. Experienced in team management, communication, and social media marketing across for-profit and non-profit sectors. Passionate about fostering community and growth.

experience.title: Founder
experience.description: Built and led a graphic design community with over 10,000 members, empowering eSports and content creators with cutting-edge visuals.

experience.title: Social Media Manager
experience.description: Developed and executed a robust social media strategy, created impactful short-form videos and graphics, and revitalized branding using Adobe Photoshop.

experience.title: Delivery Driver
experience.description: Delivered food, managed kitchen tasks, and facilitated community gym activities to promote well-being and nutrition.

experience.title: Social Media Manager
experience.description: Converted long-form content into engaging short-form posts, cultivated a community of animators, and enhanced brand presence through strategic social media campaigns.

experience.title: Lead Graphic Designer
experience.description: Designed impactful visual assets for branding and marketing initiatives using Adobe Photoshop and Illustrator.
